skills.title: Full-stack Developer
skills.description: My Full-stack skill includes but not limited to:

skills.title: Video editor
skills.description: My video editing tools and skills include:

portfolio.title: Planet Tutors: A Comprehensive Platform for Student Learning and Tutoring.
portfolio.description: Planet Tutors is a dynamic website designed to help students find tutors and access educational materials, featuring both front-end and back-end functionalities. The front-end is built using React and TypeScript for enhanced user experience, styled with Tailwind CSS for a modern look. On the back-end, it utilizes MongoDB for efficient data storage, along with Express and Node.js to create a robust API. The platform not only facilitates tutor searches but also offers educational resources, blogs, and valuable tips, all aimed at supporting students in their learning journey.

portfolio.title: HakimPodcast: A Professional Hub for Doctors
portfolio.description: As an intern at Kasma Solutions, I was responsible for the front-end design of various projects, showcasing my skills in creating user-friendly and visually appealing interfaces. My work included implementing a range of features that enhanced the user experience, such as responsive layouts, interactive components, and streamlined navigation. I utilized modern technologies and design principles to ensure that the websites not only met client specifications but also provided engaging experiences for users. This role allowed me to collaborate with cross-functional teams, contributing to the overall success of our projects while further developing my expertise in front-end development.

portfolio.title: Dash Bookstore: A Comprehensive Online Store for Renting and Buying Books.
portfolio.description: At Dash Bookstore, an online platform for renting and purchasing books, I played a crucial role in full stack development. I was responsible for both front-end and back-end development, creating a seamless user experience from design to functionality. My tasks included  implementing features for renting and buying books. On the back-end, I developed the API and managed the database to ensure efficient handling of user data and transactions. This comprehensive role enabled me to integrate various functionalities, resulting in a robust online bookstore that meets the diverse needs of book lovers.

testimonial.title: Wordpress developer
testimonial.description: Hailu has been an invaluable asset to our team as our front-end developer. His attention to detail, responsiveness, and ability to bring designs to life with clean, efficient code is truly impressive.I highly recommend Hailu for any front-end development projects.

testimonial.title: IcogLab intern
testimonial.description: Working with Hailu on our website redesign project was a dream. He took the time to understand our business objectives and target audience, and then delivered a website that perfectly matched our vision.

testimonial.title: Coworker at CheapDelala
testimonial.description: Hailu is a true master of React. His ability to craft complex, dynamic user interfaces using React's component-based architecture is truly remarkable..

graphicsdesign.title: HaTech: A Modern Platform Offering Web Services and Electronic Products
graphicsdesign.description: The HaTech website is a comprehensive platform designed to offer both tech services and electronic products. It serves as a hub for clients seeking website maintenance, development, and design services, as well as a marketplace for electronics. The design and development of the website focus on creating a seamless user experience with a clean and intuitive interface. The site features responsive layouts, organized navigation, and strategic calls to action that guide users through service offerings and product selections. This project highlights my ability to integrate e-commerce functionalities with service-based features, demonstrating my skills in front-end development, UX/UI design, and creating a professional digital presence for tech-related businesses.

graphicsdesign.title: Interactive Color Selector: Dynamic Background Changing with Hex Codes
graphicsdesign.description: This front-end app allows users to input a hexadecimal color code to dynamically change the background color of the page. Built with simplicity and user interaction in mind, the application demonstrates basic DOM manipulation and event handling using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The primary focus was to create an intuitive and responsive user interface that reacts instantly to user input, providing real-time feedback through color changes. This project showcases my understanding of core front-end development concepts and how to apply them in interactive web applications.

graphicsdesign.title: Dash: Crafting a Clean and Engaging Portfolio Landing Page
graphicsdesign.description: In this project, I designed the landing page for my personal portfolio website, Dash, with a focus on user experience and a minimalist aesthetic. The goal was to create a visually appealing and intuitive interface that clearly communicates my skills as a UX/UI designer and front-end developer.The design features a clean layout, smooth navigation, and strategic use of whitespace to guide the user's attention to key elements such as the portfolio, services, and call-to-action buttons. By incorporating modern design principles and ensuring responsive functionality, I aimed to enhance both visual engagement and usability across different devices.
